document_data.name: Swendi
document_data.mainbody: '''Swendi''' was a [[human]] from [[Maztica]] who once helped defeat a [[pteranodon]].
document_data.Description: Clad in sparse tribal clothing, Swendi had short-cropped black hair and deeply tanned skin.
document_data.Personality: Swendi was the eldest child of his tribe's chieftain. It was very important to him to be regarded as a great warrior, and he would often take great risks to accomplish this.
document_data.Possessions: He owned a [[dagger]], [[sling]], as well as a [[trident]].
document_data.History: Swendi once assisted [[Joseph]], a stowaway who ended up in Maztica,{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1991|560|Joseph}} in taking down a pteranodon.
